data.name: Russian Subway Dogs - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original soundtrack for the game Russian Subway Dogs created by musician Peter Chapman (aka COINS)


Musician Peter Chapman (Guacamelee!, LittleBigPlanet Karting, Modnation Racers) has created a banging original soundtrack packed with Slavic sounds and Baltic beats combined with electronic dance music.

Soundtrack comes in 160kbps mp3 format.

Track Listing:
1. Russian Subway Dogs Theme (1:15)
2. Intro (1:03)
3. Elektrozavodskaya (2:06)
4. Taganskaya (2:13)
5. Kievskaya (2:16)
6. Komsomolskaya (1:02)
7. Rumyantsevo (2:04)
8. Dostoevskaya (2:21)
9. Novoslobodskaya (1:56)
10. The Map (1:05)
11. Slavyansky Bulvar (2:03)
12. Bittsevsky Park (2:05)
13. Arbatskaya (2:00)
14. Slavyansky Bulvar (Alt) (2:11)
15. Beyond the Map (2:03)
16. Credits (1:24)

Total length 29:13
